title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout, the image is not refreshed and the original image remains displayed.
EB: The new image should be displayed after importing it into the layout.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Import a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 4. Check if the new image is now displayed.
